item.description:
Nitin suggested this place to do a meet-up at and after looking at it I would have to agree. I hope you all can come.

There are some changes to this meet- up

Here are the details:
We will meet at 9 am at the Upper Amanousac Falls. For late comers 12 noon at Echo Lake beach at 9 Franconia road. If you have any questions please feel free to post Nitin a greeting or email me and we will get back to you with any questions.

Jenn

It's easy to get to Franconia Notch State Park! Take I-93 north or south, depending on your starting point. The Flume Gorge and Visitor Center is located at exit 34A.
http://www.visitnh.go...
http://www.nhstatepar...

DRIVE TIMES
Concord 1 hour
Nashua 1 3/4 hours
Boston 2 1/2 hours
Hartford 3 hours
Providence 3 1/2 hours
item.how_to_find_us: Exit 34A Flume Gorge & Gilman Visitor's Center meet at visitors center
item.name: Anything goes
